transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir available ho gaye the to like connect kar lete ek baar sir. 
Customer: Sir main na busy hu thoda sa aaj aur main parso connect karu?
Executive: Parso? Actually kya sir mere paas na ek concern raised hui hai. Like the thing is ki matlab ye concern raised hui hai na to mere ko yaha pe revert karna hoga. To ya to main ye kar sakta hu ki like main yaha se concern like close kar deta hu whenever aapko jab bhi like availability hoti hai aap mujhe directly call kar sakte ho aapke paas number hai. 
Customer: Isko parso kar lenge. Parso sort out karenge isko.
Executive: Parso sort out karenge because kya rehta hai sir ultimately like in like 24 hours or 48 hours na to my manager will also ask na ki like what was the exact issue jiski wajah se ye aapka jo close nahi hua hai. 
Customer: Keh dijiye wo customer busy ho gaye the aur parso karenge connect keh dijiye.
Executive: Achcha connect jo hai aap day after tomorrow karenge right?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. Regarding everything. Jo bhi aapka like jo raha hai. 
Customer: Thoda sa na mere ko kyuki India mart bahut jyada time kha raha hai return kuch aa nahi raha.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi wo theek hai sir actually kya hai ki mere ko connect to karna padta hai kyuki aapse kyuki aapko actually batana to padega na ki kya kya cheeze hai hum solve kaise karenge agar hum connect nahi karenge to. Hame solve to karna hi padega. 
Customer: Pehle bhi na bahut jyada mera time waste hua hai aapke yaha se wo ladki phone karti thi kabhi koi phone karta tha kabhi koi itna jyada time waste hua hai ki bhai agar man lo itni bar meri video call pe meeting hui hai wo jo demonstration pe kya naam hai google meet pe kitni bar meeting hui hai. 
Executive: Google meet pe meeting hui hai aapki. 
Customer: To wo ultimately aap meri meeting. 
Executive: Ha. Ji ji ji ji. Batiye batiye. 
Customer: Samajh nahi aa raha ki bhi kya hua kya nahi hua I don't know. 
Executive: To like parso parso connect to karna hai. 
Customer: Thoda sa na main kahi busy hu main kisi kaam me sir parso connect karenge. 
Executive: Theek hai. Day after tomorrow connect karenge sir is regarding. Theek hai to main abhi is concern ko isme dal de raha hu ki like aap like day after tomorrow available rahenge for complete discussion in detail. Hai na to we will definitely connect and like like jo bhi problem rahegi us identify karte hai. Hai na aur main aapko panel ke bare me bhi bataunga. Like rating regarding ratings hai aapki ya fir jo aapke mapping galat ho rahi hai jis vajah se irrelevancy ho rahi hai jo aapko. Hai na to hum usko bhi definitely correct karenge aur meeting hi karenge. 
Customer: Theek hai ji theek hai ji. 
Executive: Ji. Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states IndiaMART is wasting time.

- Customer says no returns from IndiaMART.

- Customer says too many calls, time wasted.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect day after tomorrow.

- Executive will discuss panel and ratings.

- Executive will address mapping issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect in detail day after tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- time waste, ratings, mapping, connect
